Segment.name: L7
Segment.comment: To reference details of the tariff used to arrive at applicable rates or charge

Field.name: LadingLineItemNumber
Field.comment: Sequential line number for a lading item

Field.name: TariffAgencyCode
Field.comment: Code defining the tariff bureau or tariff publishing agent that governs the rates applied to this shipment

Field.name: TariffNumber
Field.comment: Standard tariff number for the tariff which governs the rates applied to the commodity item(s)

Field.name: TariffSection
Field.comment: Number used as an extension of the basic tariff number to identify the rates published within specific sections of the tariff

Field.name: TariffItemNumber
Field.comment: Number assigned in the tariff to specific rate or group of rates that applies to one or more items in the shipment

Field.name: TariffItemPart
Field.comment: Number assigned to subsection of a specific tariff item (arbitrary)

Field.name: FreightClassCode
Field.comment: Code indicating generalized classification that applies to one or more items in the shipment, i.e., class 70, 77.5, etc.

Field.name: TariffSupplementIdentifier
Field.comment: Identifier for the tariff supplement which contains the rate used

Field.name: ExParte
Field.comment: Level of rates as published in the tariff

Field.name: Date
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: RateBasisNumber
Field.comment: The (mileage) factor published for rating purposes in the appropriate tariff

Field.name: TariffColumn
Field.comment: A tariff commodity classification that is used, as a means of control, for grouping of commodities in tariff applications

Field.name: TariffDistance
Field.comment: Distance on which the rate for a shipment is based

Field.name: StateOrProvinceCode
Field.comment: Code (Standard State/Province) as defined by appropriate government agency
